entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is mentioned as a Death Eater who cast a spell that hit Hermione. He is described as 'baby-headed' and blundered out of sight.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being hit by Dolohov's spell and is unable to move. Neville tries to wake her up.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as trying to wake Hermione up and checking for a pulse on her wrist.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as shaking Hermione and trying to wake her up. He also listens hard for the sounds of Dolohov.

relationships.description: Dolohov cast a spell that hit Hermione, causing her to be unable to move.
Neville checked for a pulse on Hermione's wrist.
Harry listened hard for the sounds of Dolohov after he blundered out of sight.
